pages.text: Collecting items using $(item)Hoppers$() is useful, but sometimes, it can be inconvenient, especially if given a big area that one has to collect items in. For that, the $(item)Hopper Enhancement$() will be a help: By simply placing it on top of any $(item)Hopper$(), it will increase its range of picking up items drastically by about $(thing)seven$() blocks.$(br)When collecting an item, it then uses a small amount of $(aura).
